alert.note: Alert for Leake; Scott (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 15 at 7:01AM CDT until June 15 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 AM CDT FOR LEAKE AND NORTHERN SCOTT COUNTIES... At 701 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Tuscola, or 7 miles south of Carthage, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Standing Pine around 710 AM CDT. Walnut Grove around 715 AM CDT. Madden and Steele around 720 AM CDT. Sebastopol around 730 AM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
